content.raw: future imports will almost certainly break things, or worse introduce bugs that go undetected (especially with division - we already import future division in labscript, but I don't think we necessarily do in the others so we'll need to do a search for `/` and verify that we aren't relying on implicit conversion to integers in those programs).
content.html: future imports will almost certainly break things, or worse introduce bugs that go undetected (especially with division - we already import future division in labscript, but I don't think we necessarily do in the others so we'll need to do a search for / and verify that we aren't relying on implicit conversion to integers in those programs).
